record-videos-tip-long: Click on a square to start recording. You will hear a sample of the selected note playing, please repeat it after the countdown.
record-videos-tip-short: Click to record your voice now.
user-media-access-error: We were unable to access your camera and microphone. You may need to adjust your browser permissions.
not-found-error: The page you're requesting doesn't exist.
delete-song-confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this song?
delete-video-clip-confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this video clip?
mobile-playback-instructions: Swipe over the videos or press the play button.
desktop-playback-instructions: Click the videos, mash the keyboard, or press play.
